currency.definition: 1 credit = 1 RGPxScientist run right (usage right). Minting and spending are recorded as events.

events.claim: RGPxScientist turns a vague claim into a falsifiable next-step plan faster by forcing invariant→falsifier→minimal perturbations→evidence trail.
events.note: v0 growth-first gate: minimal prompt/output length + agent_id format
